result.longName: A'ayan Leasing and Investment Company K.S.C.P.

assetProfile.address2: Aayan Leasing & Investment Co. Building Al-Rai
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: A'ayan Leasing and Investment Company K.S.C.P. engages in financial investments, trading and investing in properties, and leasing activities primarily in the State of Kuwait. It operates through Islamic Financing, Leasing Sector, Real Estate, and Proprietary Investment and Assets Management segments. The company provides lease financing services; acts as financial intermediary and broker; grants credit facilities to consumers; and participates in the establishment of companies and deals in the shares of the companies on its behalf and on behalf of third parties. It is also involved in the portfolio management on behalf of the customers; investment in real estate properties in industrial, agricultural, and other sectors; and development and rental of residential land and commercial properties. In addition, the company conducts research and studies, and related activities on behalf of customers; and establishes investment funds and manages funds. Further, it engages in the leasing activities; and investment securities related activities. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
